sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- fix issue when modal is closed by uploading an image -->
  <wysiwyg v-model="myHTML" />
</template>

<script>
export default {};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.editr {
  border: none;
  ::v-deep &--content {
    margin: var(--element-margin-s) 0 var(--element-margin-l);
    border: var(--border-width-thin) solid var(--border-input-hover);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    color: var(--text-primary);
    font-family: 'OpenSans-Regular', sans-serif;
    padding: var(--element-padding-s);
    font-size: var(--size-regular);
  }
  ::v-deep &--toolbar {
    border: var(--border-width-thin) solid var(--border-input-hover);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    background-color: transparent;

    div {
      a {
        background: transparent;
        height: 30px;
        svg {
          fill: var(--text-primary);
        }
        &:hover svg {
          fill: var(--color-main-600);
        }
        &:active {
          background-color: var(--text-secondary);
          svg {
            fill: var(--text-button-comment);
          }
        }
      }
      .vw-btn-separator {
        background-color: var(--border-button-tools);
        height: var(--element-margin-xl);
      }
    }
  }
}
</style>
